snippet: Heavy rains that caused flash floods and collapsed houses in several areas of Pakistan have killed 53 people over the past three days, a Pakistani official said Monday.
abstract: Heavy rains, which caused flash floods and collapsed houses in several areas of Pakistan, kill 53 people over several days.
lead_paragraph: Heavy rains that caused flash floods and collapsed houses in several areas of Pakistan have killed 53 people over the past three days, a Pakistani official said Monday.

headline.main: Pakistan: Rough Weather Wreaks Havoc Across Region
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Rough Weather Wreaks Havoc Across Region
